name: ATPursuit
description:
Most games about microorganisms are just about getting a way of becoming something bigger. But what happens if you are trapped in just one stage of evolution, there are a lot of bigger beings wanting to eat you, and the only thing avoiding you to get eaten by them is just sugar and oxigen laying out there?

Here comes ATPursuit: move around, eat glucose and oxigen and hope it to become ATP and you'll get a energy boost for avoiding being dinner of bigger protozoos and even giant micro animals.

This is a game made for the GoGodot Jam 2, with the theme "Energy Source".

Note: Windows version works better than HTML version, and I really don't know why
